blog.flickr.net/2015/04/twitter-tuesday-.snippet: We saw a lot of beautiful bottles thrown as a message into the Flickr sea for this TwitterTuesday. That was fantastic! Thank you all for your terrific contributions. Stay tuned for our next Twitter Tuesday's theme.
